# Spells (Alphabetical List - K)
## Ka-Ke
**[[Karmic Aura (Spell)|Karmic Aura]]****:** Any creature damaging you becomes [[Fatigued|fatigued]] for 3 rounds.

**[[Karmic Backlash (Spell)|Karmic Backlash]]****:** Any creature damaging you becomes [[Exhausted|exhausted]] for 2 rounds.

**[[Karmic Retribution (Spell)|Karmic Retribution]]****:** Any creature damaging you becomes [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1 round.

**[[Keen Edge (Spell)|Keen Edge]]****:** Doubles normal weapon’s threat range.

**[[Keen Senses (Spell)|Keen Senses]]:** Gain +2 [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] and [[S3.1G-M - Universal Monster Rules G-M (Bestiary 6 Apx)|low-light vision]].

**[[Kelgore's Fire Bolt (Spell)|Kelgore’s Fire Bolt]]****:** 1d6 fire damage/level (max 5d6), partially ignore SR.

**[[Kelgore's Grave Mist (Spell)|Kelgore’s Grave Mist]]****:** 1d6 cold damage/level, cause fatigue, partially ignore SR.

**[[Kelpstrand (Spell)|Kelpstrand]]:** Strands of kelp grapple foes.

## Kf-Kj
**[[Khain's Army (Spell)|Khain’s Army]]:** 1d4+1 [[Ghoul (Bestiary PF1)|ghouls]] and 1 [[Ghoul (Bestiary PF1)|ghast]] fight for you and explode when killed to deal damage.

**[[Khyber Trap (Spell)|Khyber Trap]]****:** Trap extraplanar creature within a Khyber dragonshard.

**Ki Arrow:** Arrow deals damage as your unarmed strike.

**Ki Shout:** Target takes 1d6 sonic/level and is [[Stunned|stunned]].

**[[Killer's Eye (Spell)|Killer's Eye]]****:** Gain +1d6 sneak attack damage/3 caster levels for 1 round.

**[[Killer's Eye, Greater (Spell)|Killer's Eye, Greater]]****:** Gain +1d6 sneak attack damage/3 caster levels for 1 round/level.

**Kinetic Reverberation:** Channels the force of an enemy’s attack back into its weapon.

**[[King's Castle (Spell)|King’s Castle]]****:** Instantly switch places with a single ally.

**[[Kiss of Draconic Defiance (Spell)|Kiss of Draconic Defiance]]****:** Hinder nearby spellcasters; counter one spell automatically.

**[[Kiss of the First World (Spell)|Kiss of the First World]] <sup>M</sup>:** Grant living creatures enhanced life or undead creatures debilitating conditions.

**[[Kiss of the Toad (Spell)|Kiss of the Toad]]****:** Touch deals 1d6 Con damage, repeats in 1 minute.

**[[Kiss of the Vampire (Spell)|Kiss of the Vampire]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** You gain vampire-like  supernatural abilities, but are vulnerable to attacks that harm undead.

## Kk-Ko
**[[Knight Unburdened (Spell)|Knight Unburdened]]****:** Remove the speed penalties for medium and heavy armor.

**[[Knight's Calling (Spell)|Knight's Calling]]:** Forces target to move toward you and fight you.

**[[Knight's Move (Spell)|Knight’s Move]]****:** You instantly move to flank a subject.

**[[Knock (Spell)|Knock]]****:** Opens locked or magically sealed door.

**[[Know Bloodline (Spell)|Know Bloodline]]****:** Reveals target's type, race, subrace, and all subtypes possessed.

**[[Know Direction (Spell)|Know Direction]]****:** You discern north.

**[[Know Greatest Enemy (Spell)|Know Greatest Enemy]]:** Determines relative power level of creatures within the area.

**[[Know Opponent (Spell)|Know Opponent]]****:** Learn strengths and weaknesses of foe.

**Know the Enemy:** Gain +10 on a monster [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] check.

**[[Know Vulnerabilities (Spell)|Know Vulnerabilities]]****:** Determine subject’s vulnerabilities and resistances.

## Ku-Kz
**[[Kuo-Toa Skin (Spell)|Kuo-Toa Skin]]:** Subject gains +8 on [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] checks and cannot be snared by webs.
